publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1036 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Business Motion—That the Parliament agrees that the time for consideration of Stage 3 of the Ethical Standards in Public Life etc. (Scotland) Bill be allotted as follows, so that debate on each part of the proceedings, if not previously brought to a conclusion, shall be brought to a conclusion on the expiry of the specified period (calculated from the time when Stage 3 begins)— Section 1 to section 22 – up to 2 hours Schedule 3 to after section 24 – up to 3 hours Remainder of the Bill – up to 4 hours Motion to pass the Bill – no later than 4 hours 30 minutes. Supported by: Iain Smith*
